column3: Description

Connect AI with the web through intelligent crawling, processing, and content management, building an AI‑first, modular ecosystemfile:///home/oai/share/Howaiconnects-Platform.pdf#:~:text=The%20,seamless%2C%20intelligent%2C%20and%20customizable%20integration.

Prioritize AI components such as Latitude prompt management, queue/caching mechanisms, vector database integration, and streaming embeddings from the very beginningfile:///home/oai/share/Howaiconnects-Platform.pdf#:~:text=%27AI,very%20beginning%20of%20its%20development.

Deliver a seamless platform that combines visual planning and prompt orchestration to accelerate agent workflows and empower developers. Focus on iterative MVP delivery with high‑quality integrations and a modular architecture.

Adopt a modular architecture where each component is treated as an individual project, focusing on developer experience and production readinessfile:///home/oai/share/Howaiconnects-Platform.pdf#:~:text=%27AI,very%20beginning%20of%20its%20development.

Use a Next.js monorepo with pnpm and Turborepo for unified development, tighter integration, simplified deployment, and shared toolingfile:///home/oai/share/Howaiconnects-Platform.pdf#:~:text=The%20,This%20structure%20is%20powered%20by.

Implement miro‑adapter, embed Miro boards for visual prompt and agent design, and wire into the Prompt Labfile:///home/oai/share/Howaiconnects-Platform.pdf#:~:text=%E2%97%A6%20Miro%20AI%3A%20%E2%96%AA%20Status%3A,with%20core%20API%20client%20methods.

Implement Latitude adapter methods (listPrompts, getPrompt, createPrompt, updatePrompt), create Airtable adapter, sync script, and wire both into the Prompt Labfile:///home/oai/share/Howaiconnects-Platform.pdf#:~:text=6,packages%2Flatitudefile:///home/oai/share/Howaiconnects-Platform.pdf#:~:text=%E2%97%A6%20Airtable%20is%20the%20chosen,for%20the%20%27Prompts%27%20table%20includes.

Implement crewai‑adapter and zapier‑adapter, integrate with the Prompt Lab, and handle webhook setupsfile:///home/oai/share/Howaiconnects-Platform.pdf#:~:text=%E2%80%A2%20Wire%20the%20CrewAI%20adapter,risk%20items.
Integrate Crawl4AI service, Bright Data zone manager, AI Foundry embeddings, and Qdrant vector database; implement adaptive crawlinghttps://docs.brightdata.com/introduction.

Implement JWT authentication tenant enforcement Prometheus & Grafana dashboards; hardened API gateway and rate limitingfile:///home/oai/share/Howaiconnects-Platform.pdf#:~:text=%E2%80%A2%20Wire%20the%20CrewAI%20adapter%2Crisk%20items.
Finalize deployment on Replit conduct project review and launch the MVP.

WowDash template offers multiple dashboard variations, dark and light modes, advanced charts and graphs, widgets, cards, form elements with validation, authentication pages, and responsive designhttps://elements.envato.com/wowdash-node-js-admin-dashboard-template-FPP2JEFhttps://elements.envato.com/wowdash-node-js-admin-dashboard-template-FPP2JEFhttps://elements.envato.com/wowdash-node-js-admin-dashboard-template-FPP2JEF.
Core component for external prompt management and AI agent orchestrationfile:///home/oai/share/Howaiconnects-Platform.pdf#:~:text=6
Central AI orchestration hub defining extensible adapter interfaces for prompt control and data flowfile:///home/oai/share/Howaiconnects-Platform.pdf#:~:text=6

PostgreSQL‑based database layer storing profiles, prompts, prompt versions, and run data. Migrations must be defined earlyfile:///home/oai/share/Howaiconnects-Platform.pdf#:~:text=%E2%80%A2%20Wire%20the%20CrewAI%20adapter,risk%20items.

Structured storage for prompt templates; includes Prompts and PromptVersions tables with detailed schemafile:///home/oai/share/Howaiconnects-Platform.pdf#:~:text=%E2%97%A6%20Airtable%20is%20the%20chosen

AI agent framework used for orchestrating autonomous agents. Integration uses an adapter wired into the Prompt Labfile:///home/oai/share/Howaiconnects-Platform.pdf#:~:text=%E2%80%A2%20Wire%20the%20CrewAI%20adapter
Automation platform for integrating external services via webhooks and API requestsfile:///home/oai/share/Howaiconnects-Platform.pdf#:~:text=%E2%96%AA%20Status%3A%20Not%20natively%20integrated
Data collection service providing proxies, web access APIs, and data feeds, integrated as part of Crawl4AI and Bright Data managershttps://docs.brightdata.com/introduction.
Azure AI Foundry for managing agents, models, and orchestrating AI applicationshttps://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/ai-foundry/#:~:text=Azure%20AI%20Foundry%20documentation.
AI‑native vector database for storing and searching embeddingshttps://qdrant.tech/documentation/#:~:text=
React framework (Next.js) and backend runtime (Node.js) powering the web application and server‑side integrations.
Node.js, Next.js 15, pnpm, Turborepo, Supabase/PostgreSQL, Airtable, Latitude.so, Miro API, CrewAI, Zapier, Bright Data, AI Foundry, Qdrant, Docker, Prometheus, Grafana, Replit.
